function:function.function:description: This function converts a four-byte binary representation of an IPv4 address into a string representation.
This function converts a string representation of an IPv4 address to a four-byte binary representation. If the string does not represent a valid IPv4 address, zero is returned.

This function converts a string representing an IPv4 address into a string representation of the subnet address, using the specified number of mask bits. If the string does not represent a valid IPv4 address, or the count is negative, zero is returned.
function:function.function:prototype: public rstring convertIPV4AddressStringToSubnet(rstring ipAddress, int32 maskbits)

function:function.function:description: This function converts a four-byte binary representation of an IPv4 address into a four-byte binary subnet address, using the specified number of mask bits.
function:function.function:prototype: public uint32 convertIPV4AddressNumericToSubnet(uint32 ipAddress, int32 maskbits)

function:function.function:description: This function converts a string representing an IP address into a hostname. If the string does not contain a valid IP address, or no hostname can be found for the IP address, an empty string is returned.
This function converts a four-byte binary representation of an IPv4 address into a hostname. If no hostname can be found for the address, an empty string is returned.
This function converts a hostname into a string representation of an IP address. If no address can be found for the hostname, an empty string is returned.
This function converts a hostname into a binary IPv4 address. If no address can be found for the hostname, zero is returned.
